attributes.action: look at developing anti - malarial drug resistance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chloroquine, for years, the drug of choice in malaria prophylaxis had been replaced by more refined chemical and pharmaceutical preparations, but inadequate supplies in malarious zones worldwide and poor compliance with treatment regimes has, lead to falciparum parasites developing strains in that do not repsond to drugs. The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to ensure malaria is not the next MRSA or TB and look at how, as a G8 leader, Britain can support the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation project, which has commendably chosen malaria in pregnancy as the disease for their latest sponsorship.
